variants.text: I'm reaching out to invite you to cover the {{event_name}}, an upcoming event showcasing Europe's most promising biotech startups and the investors backing them.
I think you'd find the {{event_name}} interesting for {{publication_name}}. We're bringing together biotech innovators, investors, and industry leaders - all with compelling stories to tell.
Given your coverage of {{beat_topic}}, I wanted to make sure you knew about the {{event_name}} happening in {{event_location}}.
variants.use_case: When you know their beat/coverage area

variants.text: We're extending complimentary press passes to select journalists covering the biotech and startup ecosystem, and I'd love to reserve one for you.
variants.use_case: Lead with the free ticket offer

variants.text: I'm reaching out with a potential collaboration opportunity. We're hosting the {{event_name}} and would love to offer you a complimentary press pass in exchange for helping us spread the word about the event.
